The End!(Tragic)
(K) Press K!
Marry Lady Yanabél.
Lord Pjoter is disappointed at first, but you stay close friends. You love Lady Yanabél a lot. 
She thinks about running for election to take over rulership of the Keep. 
With dedication and your support at home she manages and she works hard to end Riverfoot Keep's cruelty. 
After only a few years the lives of the lower class have improved dramatically. 
You live a happy life as a stay at home {gender} to 2 children. 
You die from cancer possibly due to your short exposure to the fumes at the Dragon’s mouth.
